data.message: Is there a way to contact Facebook?

replies.message: Hi Wyatt. This is a great place to ask questions. How can we help? -Brittany
i am restricted from posting or joining groups on Facebook tell november 21 i didnt do anything wrong or break any group rules

Hi Wyatt. It sounds like you may have overused a feature, even if you didn't mean to. Please sit tight while the ban is in place. In the meantime, you can learn more about our policies by reviewing the Facebook Community Standards: http://bit.ly/2z1v0Ko

is there any possible way I can get it taken off if it was from posting fo sell stuff isn't that what the marketplace is for im in the middle of moving and need to get rid of some stuff i really need that restriction gone
Hi Wyatt. Unfortunately, we can't lift your temporary block for any reason. You can learn more about feature blocks here: http://bit.ly/2AJPOTJ. -Jessica
Facebook I don't even know what I did to get blocked
